favThings.name: Music
favThings.description: My favorite music genres are; Metal, Metalcore, Deathcore, Dubstep, Drum&Bass, Trap, and Riddim. Too many bands/artists to type!

favThings.name: Games
favThings.description: My favorite game genres are; Action/Adventure, Action, Strategy, RPG, MMORPG, Sandbox, Fantasy, and Hack and Slash. Once again, too many specific games to type.

favThings.name: Movies
favThings.description: My favorite movie genres are; Action, Comedy, Adventure, Comics(DC, Marvel, Etc.), Mystery, Horror, Gore, and Fantasy, Sci-Fi, and Thriller.

favThings.name: TV Shows
favThings.description: (Exactly the same as movies) My favorite TV Show genres are; Action, Comedy, Adventure, Comics(DC, Marvel, Etc.), Mystery, Horror, Gore, and Fantasy, Sci-Fi, and Thriller.

favThings.name: Friends
favThings.description: Even though they can be a huge pain, they are also very important to me and I would give the world for my friends.
